metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5418 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The sandboxing code in libarchive 3.2.0 and earlier mishandles hardlink archive entries of non-zero data size, which might allow remote attackers to write to arbitrary files via a crafted archive file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5418` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.4
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.4
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.4').
